description.description: Describes the asset to which this token represents.

external_url.description: A URI pointing to an external website. Borrowed from Open Sea's metadata format (https://docs.opensea.io/docs/metadata-standards).

media_url.description: A URI pointing to a high resolution version of the asset's media.

properties.description: Properties following the EIP-1155 'simple properties' format. (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1155.md#erc-1155-metadata-uri-json-schema)

mime_type.description: Describes the MIME type of the ASA's URL (`au` field).

attributes.description: (Deprecated. New NFTs should define attributes with the simple `properties` object. Marketplaces should support both the `properties` object and the `attributes` array). The `attributes` array follows Open Sea's format: https://docs.opensea.io/docs/metadata-standards#attributes
